step-title: What is the length of your lease term?

initial-lease-length.text: How long is the initial lease term? (Note: Include periods of free rent outside the lease term, as well as periods of early occupancy and round to the nearest whole year.)

termination-contraction-option.text: Does the lease contain a termination option during the primary lease term?

termination-exercised.text: Is the termination option "reasonably certain" of being exercised?

termination-lease-year.text: If yes, at the end of what lease year is the termination option?

renew-option.text: Does the lease contain any renewal options?

renew-option-number.text: If yes, how many renewal options are there? (Note: The initial lease term plus renewal options cannot exceed 20 years.)

renew-option-input.text: Please enter the length (in years) of Renewal Option #

renew-option-switch.text: Is this option "reasonably certain" of being exercised?

lease-term: Based on the responses above, the "term" of the lease per the new lease accounting standard is determined to be:
